Package uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.storage.sqlite

Class SQLiteDataSpecStorage

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.manchester.spinnaker.storage.sqlite.SQLiteDataSpecStorage
All Implemented Interfaces:
DatabaseAPI, DSEStorage, ProxyAwareStorage
public class SQLiteDataSpecStorage extends Object implements DSEStorage
How to actually talk to an SQLite database.
Author:
Donal Fellows

      public List<CoreLocation> listCoresToLoad(DSEStorage.Ethernet ethernet, boolean loadSystemCores) throws StorageException
      Description copied from interface: DSEStorage

      Specified by:
      listCoresToLoad in interface DSEStorage
      Parameters:
      ethernet - The ethernet we're loading onto.
      loadSystemCores - If true, just list system cores. If false, just list application (non-system) cores.

    • setArguments

      protected static void setArguments(PreparedStatement statement, Object... args) throws SQLException
      Set the arguments to a prepared statement. Convenience method.
      Parameters:
      statement - The prepared statement
      args - The arguments to set. Each may be Boolean, Integer, Long, Double, String, byte[], or null.
